name: trackerX
description: (work-in-progress) A workout tracker that allows the user to create workouts, track them, and view the tracked data.
features: register/login; create workout; create exercise; add sets; determine repititions per set; add up to 2 units of measure (e.g. KG, seconds/repitition); create your own unit of measure; track workout; view past workout data

name: Social Network - amJam
description: A musician-oriented social network for organizing casual jam sessions
features: private chat (among friends); public chat (open to anyone who is logged in); search other users; make/accept/decline friend requests; add personal bio to profile page; upload profile picture; register/login

name: Imageboard
description: A single-page application for uploading and commenting on images. For demonstration purposes the images were taken from reddit.com/r/doodles
features: upload image and give it a title, description, and artist name; a modal for viewing individual images; comment on images; infinite scroll when viewing all images

name: Petition
features: sign petition by virtual signature on a canvas; view all other signees; view other signees by city; insert profile information (Age, City, Homepage); edit profile information; register/login; reset password; delete account

name: Connect 4
description: A two-player game where the first player to align 4 of their chips vertically, horizontally or diagonally wins the game
features: Mousing over the board shows which player's turn it is and where the chip will fall upon click; playable with mouse or keyboard; scorekeeping; 'Play Again' button clears the board; 'Reset Score' button clears the board and resets the score

name: Spotify Search
description: A spotify api that allows the user to search artists and albums that are currently on spotify
features: search-bar with input field for search term and button for choosing album/artist; clicking on search result redirects the corresponding artist/album page on spotify.com; infinite scroll (by typing '?scroll=infinitely' at end of url and then searching)
